name: Man (Xenoparrot)
description:
A spear bearing hunter has gone back in time to conquer history's most dangerous animals and prove that he is the true apex predator. Unfortunately history failed to inform him of what those animals were truly capable of.

Made for Xanderjam 6. The theme was "Survival of the Fittest". That theme was applied simply: an advanced human seeks to prove he is more powerful than any creature in all of history. It comes down to a fight, and the human intends to win.

I programmed and built the game. My brother did all of the art.
